answers.answer: In the U.S. they have you drink a sugar drink, wait an hour, then they draw a few viles of blood and test it. They will tell you the results at the next appt.
Yah what roopstetter said im from canada as well and its the same testing.

question: How do they test you after you drink and sit for 1-2hrs? Do they just prick your finger? I'm in Canada so idk if they do it differently here?Thanks!
